Description: Unfinished / imperfect bead: tear-drop shape in translucent dark-blue glass.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Curator's comments: The bead has trails of glass coming off at both ends, from manufacture. Probably the purpose if its discard.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1894 / Tell el Amarna (pl. XIII, p. 56)
